text.author: N S Andres and R T Ponce
text.title: Utilization of busted CFL in developing cheap and efficient segmented compact LED bulbs
text.summary: Motivated by their popularity and environmental impact in the Philippines, this paper presents a project recycling busted Compact Fluorescent Light (CFL) bulbs into more efficient and environmentally friendly Light-Emitting Diode (LED) light bulbs.
